mapper.insert: insert into users(email, name, password, birthday, phone, email_verify, phone_verify, email_check, phone_check) value(#{email}, #{name}, #{password}, #{birthday}, #{phone}, #{emailVerify}, #{phoneVerify}, #{emailCheck}, #{phoneCheck})
insert into user_role(user_id) select user_id from users where email=#{email}
mapper.select: select userId, email, name, password, from users where email=#{email}
select authority from user where user_id=#{user_id}
